page.title: 20ST ADRIANS SCHOOL
page.content: St. Adrians School is a Roman Catholic mixed junior and infant school.Many of us children live in the parish of{St. {Bartholomews Church}.We have two vertically grouped infant classes,and one infant class where half of the children from each of these classes come together at the age of seven.Then come 4 junior classes.This year the school celebrates its{Silver Jubilee in September.Cardinal Hume will come to say Mass for us.We have a football {team,}Netball team,go swimming.We sing a lot and enter the St. Albans Schools Choirs festival.We do{Environmental {studies}and have a nature trail round our field.We have Hawthorn, Elder,Norway Maple,Ash and Horse Chestnut trees.We have insects like ladybirds and beetles,we like worms and snails.We keep tadpoles to help save frogs.We love nature walks.
